sentences.en: A few of cells have ICDS with closed lumen and autodesmosomes.
sentences.cn: 少数细胞中可见带部分关闭腔的ICDS(ICDSwith aclosed Iumen) 和自体桥粒(Autodesmosomes).

sentences.en: A lumen is a measure of the rate of emission of light energy.
sentences.cn: 流明是光能放射率的量度单位.

sentences.en: An older unit, the lumen per square foot, or foot - candle, has become obsolete.
sentences.cn: 一种较老的单位是每平方米英尺的流明数, 即英寸烛光, 这种单位已经废除.

sentences.en: An older unit, the lumen per square foot, or foot-candle, has become obsolete .
sentences.cn: 一种较老的单位是每平方米英尺的流明数，即英寸烛光，这种单位已经废除。

sentences.en: Fig .3 EPSPC tumor cell containing dense - electron granules and small lumen.
sentences.cn: 图3EPSPC肿瘤细胞内的密电子颗粒及小腺腔.

sentences.en: In this image, they are present within the lumen of a large benign gland.
sentences.cn: 下图中的良性前列腺体的大管腔内可以见到这种结晶体.

sentences.en: It can show the lumen image in focus.
sentences.cn: 它能够清晰真实的再现人体内腔的二维平面图像.

sentences.en: Lumen : The unit for measuring luminous flux.
sentences.cn: 流明: 量度光通量的单位.

sentences.en: Lumen output a fluorescent lamp after it has been operating 100 hours.
sentences.cn: 荧光灯燃点100小时后的光通输出.

sentences.en: MPR could display mural thrombus , flap, true and false lumen.
sentences.cn: MPR可较好显示附壁血栓, 真假腔和内膜片.

sentences.en: One solution flows through the central lumen of the fibers.
sentences.cn: 一种溶液从纤维的中心腔流过.

sentences.en: Reconnect main lumen to suction source.
sentences.cn: 请将主腔管道连接吸引源.

sentences.en: The arteriolar wall is markedly thickened and the lumen is narrowed.
sentences.cn: 动脉壁明显增厚,管腔狭窄.

sentences.en: The conical configuration of the appendix makes obstruction of the lumen unlikely.
sentences.cn: 阑尾呈圆锥形,不易造成腔内梗阻.

sentences.en: The innermost region of cotton is called lumen.
sentences.cn: 棉纤维的最内层组织叫中腔.

sentences.en: The lumen is large, without any narrowing atheromatous plaque.
sentences.cn: 腔较大, 不伴有动脉粥样硬化斑块引起的管腔狭窄.

words.tran_cn: 流明（光束的能量单位）；（管状器官内的）内腔

trans.tran_cn: 流明（光通量单位），[植物]（管）腔
trans.tran_en: the derived SI unit of luminous flux; the flux emitted in a solid angle of 1 steradian by a point source having a uniform intensity of 1 candela
